meanings.definition: A man who receives a salary for his work.
meanings.sent1: The salarymen in the office work hard every day.
meanings.sent2: The salarymen gathered for a meeting to discuss their projects.
meanings.sent3: The salarymen decided to have a friendly competition to see who could finish their tasks first.
meanings.sent4: The salarymen were like busy bees, buzzing around the office with their tasks.
meanings.sent5: The image of the salarymen diligently typing away at their desks stayed with me.
